scripts.build: cat style.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --include-path node_modules/nhsuk-frontend/packages/nhsuk/ style.scss --output-style expanded > style.css | cat style-gutenburg.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --include-path node_modules/nhsuk-frontend/packages/nhsuk/  style-gutenburg.scss --output-style expanded > style-gutenburg.css | cat page-colours.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ page-colours.scss --output-style expanded > page-colours.css
scripts.build-minify: cat style.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --include-path node_modules/nhsuk-frontend/packages/nhsuk/ style.scss --output-style expanded > style.css | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --include-path node_modules/nhsuk-frontend/packages/nhsuk/ style.scss --output-style compressed > style.min.css
scripts.compress: postcss style.css > style.min.css | postcss page-colours.css > page-colours.min.css
